Name: Data Overdash
Description: The Black Shores' researcher is waiting for you to test out her new ideas.
QuestDesc: The Black Shores' researcher is waiting for you to test out her new ideas.

Dialogues.Speaker: Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You know that data overflow incident, right? I just got some fascinating ideas from it! The embodied data can be used to create fun stuff as well!

Dialogues.Speaker: Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For example... an Overdashing Challenge unique to the Black Shores, inspired by Jinzhou's Overdash Club! Care to give it a try?

Dialogues.Speaker: Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll collect as much data as possible. Let's get it started!

Dialogues.Speaker: Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sure thing. Let me know if you're available.

Dialogues.Speaker: Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And next, maybe I can use the data as building blocks...

Dialogues.Speaker: Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oops! This is... Well, I probably used the wrong source file...

Dialogues.Speaker: Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So sorry about this! I'll be more cautious next time!

Dialogues.Speaker: Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course! Piecing the data segments together is like making a game! And a game always has its rewards!
